Type.Name: ErrorHandler

TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void ErrorHandler(object o, Gda.ErrorArgs args);

Type.ThreadSafetyStatement: Gtk# is thread aware, but not thread safe; See the Gtk# Thread Programming for details.

remarks.para: The following events utilize this delegate:
Event data is passed via the parameter.

To attach a to an event, add the ErrorHandler instance to the event. The methods referenced by the ErrorHandler instance are invoked whenever the event is raised, until the ErrorHandler is removed from the event.
